00028  //
00029  // ModelTrainer abstract class.  Includes implementation of line minimiser
00030  // and minimum bracket algorithms which are based heavily on the Netlab
00031  // toolbox originally written in Matlab by Prof Ian Nabney
00032  //
00033  // History:
00034  //
00035  // 12 Dec 2008 - BRI - First implementation. 
00036  //
00037

00041 #include "ModelTrainer.h"
00042 
00043 ModelTrainer::ModelTrainer(Optimisable& m) : model(m)
00044 {
00045         // default training options
00046         display = true;
00047         errorTolerance = 1.0e-6;
00048         parameterTolerance = 1.0e-4;
00049         
00050         gradientCheck = false; // perform a gradient check
00051         analyticGradients = true; // use analytic gradient calculations
00052         
00053         functionEvaluations = 0; // reset function counter
00054         gradientEvaluations = 0; // reset gradient counter
00055         functionValue = 0.0; // current function value
00056         
00057         lineMinimiserIterations = 10;
00058         lineMinimiserParameterTolerance = 1.0e-4;
00059         
00060         maskSet = false; // do we want to mask certain parameters
00061         
00062         epsilon = 1.0e-6;       // delta for finite difference approximation
00063 }
00064 
00065 ModelTrainer::~ModelTrainer()
00066 {
00067 }

00069 
00070 double ModelTrainer::errorFunction(vec params)
00071 {
00072         functionEvaluations++;
00073         vec xOld = getParameters();
00074         
00075         // Compute error
00076         setParameters(params);
00077         double err = model.objective();
00078         
00079         // Don't forget to reset parameters to their initial state
00080         setParameters(xOld);
00081         
00082         return err;
00083 }
00084 
00085 vec ModelTrainer::errorGradients(vec params)
00086 {
00087     vec xOld = getParameters();
00088     vec grad;
00089 
00090     
00091         if(analyticGradients)
00092         {
00093                 gradientEvaluations++;
00094                 
00095                 // Computer error gradient
00096                 setParameters(params);
00097                 grad = model.gradient();
00098                 
00099                 // Don't forget to reset parameters to their initial state
00100                 setParameters(xOld);
00101         }
00102         else
00103         {
00104                 grad = numericalGradients(params);
00105         }
00106         
00107         // Gradient is zero for parameters not in optimisation mask
00108         if (maskSet) {
00109             for (int i=0; i<optimisationMask.length(); i++) {
00110                 if (optimisationMask(i) == false) grad(i) = 0.0;
00111             }
00112         }
00113         
00114         return grad;
00115 }
00116 
00117 vec ModelTrainer::numericalGradients(const vec params)
00118 {
00119         vec g;
00120         int numParams = params.size();
00121 
00122         g.set_size(numParams);
00123         for(int i=0; i < numParams; i++)
00124         {
00125                 g(i) = calculateNumericalGradient(i, params);
00126         }
00127         return(g);
00128 }
00129 
00130 double ModelTrainer::calculateNumericalGradient(const int parameterNumber, const vec params)
00131 {
00132         vec xNew;
00133         double fplus, fminus;
00134         
00135         xNew = params;
00136         xNew(parameterNumber) = xNew(parameterNumber) + epsilon;
00137                 
00138         fplus = errorFunction(xNew);
00139                 
00140         xNew = params;
00141         xNew(parameterNumber) = xNew(parameterNumber) - epsilon;
00142         fminus = errorFunction(xNew);
00143         
00144         return (0.5 * ((fplus - fminus) / epsilon));
00145 }
00146         
00147 void ModelTrainer::setParameters(const vec p)
00148 {
00149         if(maskSet)
00150         {
00151                 vec maskedParameters = model.getTransformedParameters();
00152                 for(int i = 0 ; i < optimisationMask.size() ; i++)
00153                 {
00154                         if(optimisationMask(i)) maskedParameters(i) = p(i);
00155                 }
00156                 model.setTransformedParameters(maskedParameters);
00157         }
00158         else
00159         {
00160                 model.setTransformedParameters(p);
00161         }
00162 }

00165 {
00166     // It is probably safer to return all parameters and simply set 
00167     // the gradient of the non-masked ones to zero, rather than extracting
00168     // subsets of the parameters.
00169     /*
00170     if(maskSet)
00171         {
00172                 vec p = model.getParametersVector();
00173                 vec maskedParameters;
00174                 assert(optimisationMask.size() == p.size());
00175                 for(int i = 0 ; i < optimisationMask.size() ; i++)
00176                 {
00177                         if(optimisationMask(i) == true)
00178                         {
00179                                 maskedParameters = concat(maskedParameters, p(i));
00180                         }
00181                 }
00182                 return maskedParameters;
00183         }
00184         else
00185         */
00186         {
00187                 return model.getTransformedParameters();
00188         }
00189 }

00191 void ModelTrainer::checkGradient()
00192 {
00193         vec xOld = getParameters();
00194         vec gNew = model.gradient();
00195         int numParams = gNew.size();
00196         int pos = 0;
00197         
00198         double delta;
00199 
00200         cout << "==========================" << endl;
00201         cout << "GRADCHECK" << endl;
00202         cout << "X = " << xOld << endl << endl;
00203         cout << "     Delta, Analytic, Diff" << endl;
00204         cout << "--------------------------" << endl;
00205         
00206 
00207         for(int i=0; i < numParams; i++)
00208         {
00209                 cout << "#" << i << " ";
00210                 if(maskSet)
00211                 {
00212                         if(optimisationMask(i))
00213                         {
00214                                 delta = calculateNumericalGradient(i, xOld);
00215                                 cout << " ";
00216                         }
00217                         else
00218                         {
00219                                 delta = 0.0;
00220                                 gNew(i) = 0.0;
00221                                 cout << "x";
00222                         }
00223                 }
00224                 else
00225                 {
00226                         delta = calculateNumericalGradient(i, xOld);
00227                 }
00228                 cout << " " << delta << ", " << gNew(i) << ", " << abs(delta - gNew(i)) <<endl;
00229 
00230         }
00231         cout << "==========================" << endl;
00232 
00233 }

00235 void ModelTrainer::Summary() const
00236 {
00237         cout << "================================================" << endl;
00238         cout << "Training summary     : " << algorithmName << endl;
00239         cout << "------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00240         cout << "Error tolerance      : " << errorTolerance << endl;
00241         cout << "Parameter tolerance  : " << parameterTolerance << endl;
00242         cout << "Function evaluations : " << functionEvaluations << endl;
00243         cout << "Gradient evaluations : " << gradientEvaluations << endl;
00244         cout << "Function value       : " << functionValue << endl;
00245         cout << "================================================" << endl;
00246 }
00247 
00248 double ModelTrainer::lineFunction(vec param, double lambda, vec direction)
00249 {
00250         double f;
00251         vec xOld = getParameters();
00252         f = errorFunction(param + (lambda * direction));
00253         setParameters(xOld);
00254         return(f);
00255 }
00256 
00257 void ModelTrainer::lineMinimiser(double &fx, double &x, double fa, vec params, vec direction)
00258 {
00259         double br_min, br_mid, br_max;
00260         double w, v, e, d = 0, r, q, p, u, fw, fu, fv, xm, tol1;
00261 
00262         bracketMinimum(br_min, br_mid, br_max, 0.0, 1.0, fa, params, direction);
00263 
00264         w = br_mid;
00265         v = br_mid;
00266         x = v;
00267         e = 0.0;
00268         fx = lineFunction(params, x, direction);
00269         fv = fx;
00270         fw = fx;
00271 
00272         for(int n = 1; n <= lineMinimiserIterations; n++)
00273         {
00274                 xm = 0.5 * (br_min + br_max);
00275                 tol1 = TOL * abs(x) + TINY;
00276  
00277                 if((abs(x - xm) <= lineMinimiserParameterTolerance) & ((br_max - br_min) < (4 * lineMinimiserParameterTolerance)))
00278                 {
00279                         functionValue = fx;
00280                         return;
00281                 }
00282                 
00283                 if (abs(e) > tol1)
00284                 {
00285                         r = (fx - fv) * (x - w);
00286                         q = (fx - fw) * (x - v);
00287                         p = ((x - v) * q) - ((x - w) * r);
00288                         q = 2.0 * (q - r);
00289 
00290                         if (q > 0.0)
00291                         {
00292                                 p = -p;
00293                         }
00294                         
00295                         q = abs(q);
00296 
00297                         if ((abs(p) >= abs(0.5 * q * e)) | (p <= (q * (br_min - x))) | (p >= (q * (br_max - x))))
00298                         {
00299                                 if (x >= xm)
00300                                 {
00301                                         e = br_min - x;
00302                                 }
00303                                 else
00304                                 {
00305                                         e = br_max - x;
00306                                 }
00307                       d = CPHI * e;
00308                    }
00309                         else
00310                         {
00311                                 e = d;
00312                                 d = p / q;
00313                                 u = x + d;
00314                                 if (((u - br_min) < (2 * tol1)) | ((br_max - u) < (2 * tol1)))
00315                                 {
00316                                         d = sign(xm - x) * tol1;
00317                                 }
00318                         }
00319                 }
00320                 else
00321                 {
00322                         if (x >= xm)
00323                         {
00324                                 e = br_min - x;
00325                         }
00326                         else
00327                         {
00328                                 e = br_max - x;
00329                         }
00330                         d = CPHI * e;
00331                 }
00332         
00333                 if (abs(d) >= tol1)
00334                 {
00335                         u = x + d;
00336                 }
00337                 else
00338                 {
00339                         u = x + sign(d) * tol1;
00340                 }
00341                 
00342                 fu = lineFunction(params, u, direction);
00343 
00344                 if (fu <= fx)
00345                 {
00346                         if (u >= x)
00347                         {
00348                                 br_min = x;
00349                         }
00350                         else
00351                         {
00352                                 br_max = x;
00353                         }
00354                         v = w; w = x;x = u;
00355                         fv = fw; fw = fx;       fx = fu;
00356                 }
00357                 else
00358                 {
00359                         if (u < x)
00360                         {
00361                                 br_min = u;
00362                         }   
00363                         else
00364                         {
00365                                 br_max = u;
00366                         }
00367                 
00368                         if ((fu <= fw) | (w == x))
00369                         {
00370                                 v = w; w = u;
00371                                 fv = fw; fw = fu;
00372                         }
00373                         else
00374                         {
00375                                 if ((fu <= fv) | (v == x) | (v == w))
00376                                 {
00377                                         v = u; fv = fu;
00378                                 }
00379                         }
00380 // add an option for lineMinimiser display?
00381 //                      if (display)
00382 //                      {
00383 //                              //fprintf(1, 'Cycle %4d  Error %11.6f\n', n, fx);
00384 //                              cout << "Line Minimiser: Cycle " << n;
00385 //                              cout << "  Error " << fx << endl;
00386 //                      }
00387                 }
00388         }
00389 }
00390 
00391 void ModelTrainer::bracketMinimum(double &br_min, double &br_mid, double &br_max, double a, double b, double fa, vec params, vec direction)
00392 {
00393         double c, fc, r, q, u, ulimit, fu = 0.0;
00394         double fb = lineFunction(params, b, direction);
00395 
00396         bool bracket_found;
00397 
00398         const double max_step = 10.0;
00399 
00400         if(fb > fa)
00401         {
00402                 c = b;
00403                 b = a + (c - a) / PHI;
00404                 fb = lineFunction(params, b, direction);
00405                 
00406                 while (fb > fa)
00407                 {
00408                         c = b;
00409                 b = a + (c - a) / PHI;
00410                 fb = lineFunction(params, b, direction);
00411                 }
00412         }
00413         else
00414         {
00415                 c = b + PHI * (b - a);
00416                 fc = lineFunction(params, c, direction);
00417 
00418                 bracket_found = false;
00419   
00420                 while (fb > fc)
00421                 {
00422                         r = (b - a) * (fb - fc);
00423                         q = (b - c) * (fb - fa);
00424                         u = b - ((b - c) * q - (b - a) * r) / (2.0 * (sign(q - r) * max(abs(q - r), TINY)));
00425 
00426                         ulimit = b + max_step * (c - b);
00427     
00428                         if ((b - u) * (u - c) > 0.0)
00429                         {
00430                                 fu = lineFunction(params, u, direction);
00431                                 if (fu < fc)
00432                                 {
00433                                         br_min = b;     br_mid = u;     br_max = c;
00434                                         return;
00435                                 }
00436                                 else
00437                                 {
00438                                         if (fu > fb)
00439                                         {
00440                                                 br_min = a;     br_mid = c;     br_max = u;
00441                                                 return;
00442                                         }
00443                                 }
00444                                 u = c + PHI * (c - b);
00445                         }
00446                         else
00447                         {
00448                                 if ((c - u) * (u - ulimit) > 0.0)
00449                                 {
00450                                         fu = lineFunction(params, u, direction);
00451 
00452                                         if (fu < fc)
00453                                         {
00454                                                 b = c;
00455                                                 c = u;
00456                                                 u = c + PHI * (c - b);
00457                                         }
00458                                         else
00459                                         {
00460                                                 bracket_found = true;
00461                                         }
00462                                 }
00463                                 else
00464                                 {
00465                                         if ((u - ulimit) * (ulimit - c) >= 0.0)
00466                                         {
00467                                                 u = ulimit;
00468                                         }
00469                                         else
00470                                         {
00471                                                 u = c + PHI * (c - b);
00472                                         }
00473                                 }
00474                         }
00475                         
00476                         if(!bracket_found)
00477                         {
00478                                 fu = lineFunction(params, u, direction);
00479                         }
00480                         a = b; b = c; c = u;
00481                         fa = fb; fb = fc; fc = fu;
00482                 }
00483         }
00484         
00485         br_mid = b;
00486 
00487         if(a < c)
00488         {
00489                 br_min = a; br_max = c;
00490         }
00491         else
00492         {
00493                 br_min = c; br_max = a;
00494         }
00495 }
